name: CONDUTTORE
description:
is a 10 Seconds experience game. You can let piano notes drop by pressing the right number: 1=C 2=D 3=E 4=F 5=G 6=A 7=H 8=C2 Drag And Drop the notes were you want them to be played. You have 10 seconds time to create a tune of your imagination. ♪♫♫♪►

________________________________________________________________________________

This prototype was created at the GameDesign//UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai  "Game A Week"   (Summer Semester 2019)
